record.title: RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR
record.narrative:
RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR -- (Senate - January 25, 2008)

[Page: S317]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate recess subject to the call of the Chair.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:04 p.m., recessed subject to the call of the Chair and reassembled at 12:07 p.m., when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Ms. KLOBUCHAR).

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
